body.name: Skintimate Skin Therapy Moisturizing Shave Gel for Women Dry Skin with Lanolin and Olive Butter - 7 Ounce (Pack of 6)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 25% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 35 mins
body.description: Get the moisturization you crave in a rich, nourishing gel. Skintimate(r) Dry Skin Women's Shave Gel contains moisturizing lanolin and Vitamin E - along with other conditioners, emollients and lubricants. Rich lather lets your razor glide smoothly, to help prevent nicks and cuts.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #31,627 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #17 in Women's Shaving Gels

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skintimate Skin Therapy Dry Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Vanilla Sugar Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Raspberry Rain Moisturizing Shave Gel Shave Gel Benefits Replenish your skin's natural moisture with Skintimate Dry Skin Shave Gel and stop dreading the shave. The lotion-like gel foams into a rich protective lather for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, healthy-looking skin Skintimate Sensitive Skin Shave Gel is formulated with extra conditioners and lubricants like aloe and Vitamin E to moisturize and soften skin, and protect against painful nicks and irritation. It even helps replenish your skin’s natural moisture Formulated with six hydrating moisturizers, including shea butter and Vitamin E, with the rich, sweet scent of Vanilla and Sugar Formulated with six moisturizers, Vitamin E and olive butter, this foaming shave gel with a luscious scent creates a rich, luxurious lather that aids razor glide for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, show-stopping legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon for the win
reviews.reviewText: Wife’s and daughter’s fav shaving cream. Of course our local club store all of a sudden stopped carrying this. That’s ok, Amazon does and at or cheaper and gets here super fast. TY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality! A must buy AAAA+++++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and creamy for a knick-proof shave
reviews.reviewText: Great price and value. Works using a small amount. Very happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for dry, sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely sensitive skin and can only *usually* use products that don't have fragrance. THIS PRODUCT DOES have fragrance but it doesn't bother my extremely sensitive skin. I love that it comes in a 6 pack because nothing is worse than running out of shaving cream after just one leg is done. I'd recommend to anyone that has dry skin. As always with sensitive skin, please try a small amount on a part of your body. Usually wait 24 for any reaction. I do have eczema and dry, damaged skin from cold winters. I think you will love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is my favorite
reviews.reviewText: I use this for all areas that I shave and I like it because it makes my skin soft while also providing the protection I need. I've tried using the store brand instead of this one and keep coming back to it. I subscribe and save now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky smooth legs
reviews.reviewText: Great for silky legs with blue Venus Gillette women’s razor and Eucerin lotion after shaving! They to get a nice tan to look waxed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'm a man... and I endorse Skintimate!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a dude and I... like to keep myself nice and smooth in places.... My masculinity is not so fragile that I won't use a woman's product for it, and this is the beez neez to keep my skin from getting irritated when taking care of business... yet not having a fruity or other heavy scent. Skintimate has other scents that will make you smell like strawberries, which is rather odd for a manly man like me (cough), but this one doesn't leave any.It says to wet the skin but you have to make sure that your skin is not DRIPPING wet before applying or else it will just run off. Use plenty and you'll avoid any irritation.And to avoid irritation even better, make sure to exfoliate often to avoid ingrown hairs.Yes, I am a man... giving skin tips.... for where the sun don't shine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells like a lady!
reviews.reviewText: Why fool with men's shaving cream when you can have this? I love this product. Is kind to my sensitive skin. And, you only have to use a little and it lasts a long time. I highly recommend it. I've been using it for years!
